text: Pépé Bonet Kapambu (born 13 February 2003) is a Congolese professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for the club Rennes in the French Ligue 1. ==Professional career== On 10 July 2019, Bonet signed his first professional contract with Rennes. Bonet made his professional debut with Rennes in a 1-0 UEFA Europa League loss to CFR Cluj on 24 October 2019. ==References== ==External links== * * * Stade Rennais Profile Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Kinshasa Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Stade Rennais F.C. players Category:Championnat National 3 players Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo expatriate footballers Category:Democratic Republic of the Congo expatriates in France Category:Expatriate footballers in France
title: Pépé Bonet
